Class NewBoard

java.lang.Object
NewBoard
public class NewBoard
extends java.lang.Object
Operates Minesweeper in General

This Class Manages the Game by storing Information in context to the game as well as managing inputs the player gives it.

Since:
1.00.0

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

      Parameters:

    • playGame

      public void playGame​(boolean allInOne)
      Allows you to either call everything yourself outside the program or just run it all automatically

      Send true if you want things like game setup and routine loop to start automatically, it will also ask at the end if you want to play another game or not. If however you wish to manage this all yourself, you can instead pass false through which will disable these games. NOTE: you will have to setupGame(), startGame() and should you wish to continuously run the process, playAgain() and resetBoard()

      Parameters:
      allInOne - pass true for minesweeper to set itself up and run automatically else set false.

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Starts the game

      This will start a timer which will then keep track of how long you take to complete the board. It will then begin the main loop of the game.

    • gameRules

      public void gameRules()
      Just some Instructions of the Game.

    • resetBoard

      public void resetBoard()
      Resets the Game Board

    • setupGame

      public void setupGame()
      Sets the Game up

      Collects the User input for board proportions and mine count. makes sure these inputs are valid entries.

    • makeBoard

      public void makeBoard()
      constructs a new board and constructs new Cells.

    • checkForVictory

      public boolean checkForVictory()
      Check if a victory has been made on this board or not
      Returns:
      returns true if this board is a winner and false if not.

    • printBrd

      public void printBrd​(boolean cheatBrd)
      Prints a copy of the Board
      Parameters:
      cheatBrd - if true, will print a copy of the Board with all mine locations
